title: Video: Fthrsn – Middle School Dance
body:
**Fthrsn**’s debut mini album, _Middle School Swag_, is fast becoming one of my most beloved albums of the year.

It’s perfectly situated for the time of my life I’m in right now; close enough to my school years to remember them with clarity, while also slowly feeling their relevance to my current life slipping. One of the highlights from the record, _Middle School Dance_, now has a video. It’s pretty fucking joyous.
